attributes.action: Ask the Chancellor to step down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paul Gray, head of HMRC did the honorable thing and resigned over the missing discs debacle, the Chancellor has lost all credibility and is making things worse by staying in post, appoint someone who the public respect & trust to sort this mess out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
